eye_o_t_storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1" movement and adds 1 to hit rolls against it.
eye_o_t_storm.name: Eye of the Storm

hurricane_armor.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, each time that unit rolls a 1 or 2 on a save roll, the attacking unit takes 1 hit with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times.
hurricane_armor.name: Hurricane Armor

thunder_strike.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes an automatic hit with AP(3) and Lethal.
thunder_strike.name: Thunderbolt

eternal_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.
eternal_tactics.name: Eternal Tactics

lightning_field.description: Roll a D10 each time this unit is hit by a Shooting attack. On each roll of a 1 or 2 an attack is prevented.
lightning_field.name: Lightning Field

soul_lantern.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.
soul_lantern.name: Soul Lantern

strategies.description: Use this strategy when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
strategies.flavor: The Storm Wardens wear enchanted armor, absorbing the force of enemy attacks, rendering them harmless
strategies.name: Stormshroud Armor

strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
strategies.flavor: Raining down from the sky like thunderstrikes, the Storm Wardens use magical portals to strike from behind enemy lines.
strategies.name: Stormstrike Portals

strategies.description: Use when a unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Defensive Stance reaction without testing Initiative.
strategies.flavor: Any foe foolish enough to strike a Storm Warden will feel the wrath of a thousand storms.
strategies.name: Counter Attack

celestial_lord.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.
celestial_lord.name: Celestial Lord

celestial_lord_dragon.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.
celestial_lord_dragon.name: Celestial Lord on Starborn Drake

celestial_lord_lizard.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.
celestial_lord_lizard.name: Celestial Lord on Dragon-Lizard

dragon_riders.description: Powerful warrior mages that have tamed ferocious dragons, bringing judgement from above to the forces of evil.
dragon_riders.name: Dragon Guard

heavy_protectors.description: Warrior mages in with the heaviest equipment, tasked with shattering the foe at all cost.
heavy_protectors.name: Heavy Protectors

invokers.description: Warrior mages who channel the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.
invokers.name: Invokers

invokers_lizard.description: Warrior mages who channel the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.
invokers_lizard.name: Invokers on Dragon-Lizards

lightning_mage.description: A mighty lightning mage, capable of hailing down magical storms onto their foes.
lightning_mage.name: Stormcaller Mage

lightning_mage_on_gryhpon.description: A mighty lightning mage on a hardy gryphon mount, swooping down on his foes.
lightning_mage_on_gryhpon.name: Stormcaller Mage on Gryphon

protectors.description: Warrior mages in heavy armor who infuse their great-weapons with elemental magic.
protectors.name: Protectors

storm_chariot.description: A powerful chariot driven by the Wardens to harry flanks and break formations.
storm_chariot.name: Storm Chariot

stormforged_archers.description: Warriors mages who use the elements to strengthen their bows.
stormforged_archers.name: Stormforged Archers

stormforged_hunters.description: Warrior mages who use the elements to strengthen their crossbows.
stormforged_hunters.name: Stormforged Arbalestiers

stormforged_skirms.description: Warrior mages fighting at the vanguard of the force.
stormforged_skirms.name: Stormforged Skirmishers

stormforged_warriors.description: Warrior mages in heavy armor who use the power of lightning to strengthen their weapons.
stormforged_warriors.name: Stormforged Warriors

stormwing_lord.description: A warrior mage leader, held aloft by enchanted wings and harnessing the powers of the elements.
stormwing_lord.name: Stormwing Lord

stormwings.description: Warrior mages, held aloft by enchanted wings and harnessing the powers of the elements.
stormwings.name: Stormwings

wardens.description: Warrior mages in heavy armor who have sworn to protect their mighty leaders.
wardens.name: Wardens
